(d) TASUED requires two (2)'A’ level passes or

(xiii) EDKANO - Candidates must obtain not less than eight

(xiv)AAUA accepts  
(e) NCE merit in Education, Geography and one (1) 
of Economic s, Government, Mathematics or 
other relevant subject.  
(f) two (2) 'A’ level passes from Geography, 
Government/History and Economics.  
(g) ND in Environmental Management, Geography, 
Information System; ND upper credit in Town 
Planning and Estate Management.  
(xiv) UMYUK accepts ‘A’ level passes in Geography and any 
other Science subject, Economics or Government. 
NCE credit in Geography and any other Science or 
Social Science subjects.  
  
UTME  
(i) PHC, DELSU, CALABAR, UDU, EDALV, and UYO accept 
'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(ii) ABUJA and UDU accept ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
(iii) OOU and ABSU   require Government or Economics.  
(iv) EKSU requires two (2) Social Science subjects.  
(v) OAU requires'O' levelcredit passes in 
Geography/Physics and any two (2) of Economics, 
Government, Mathematics and History.  
(vi) BENIN requires Mathematics, Geography/Physics and 
one (1) other Social Science subject.
